original_text: You have not been faithful to me, so I am very angry with you. I will cause these men to punish you in cruel ways. They will cut off your noses and your ears. They will use their swords to kill any men who remain. They will take away your sons and daughters. Fire will destroy any of your people who remain.
korean_text: 내가 너를 향하여 질투하리니 그들이 분내어 네 코와 귀를 깎아 버리고 남은 자를 칼로 엎드러뜨리며 네 자녀를 빼앗고 그 남은 자를 불에 사르며

sentences.original_text: You have not been faithful to me
so I am very angry with you
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 나는 너에게 매우 화가 나있다

sentences.original_text: I will cause these men to punish you
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 이 사람들이 너를 벌하게 할 것이다

sentences.original_text: They will punish you in cruel ways
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 너를 잔인한 방식으로 벌할 것이다

sentences.original_text: They will cut off your noses
They will use their swords to kill any men
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 칼을 사용하여 남자들을 죽일 것이다

sentences.original_text: They will take away your sons
Fire will destroy any of your people
